byf.title: Before you follow
byf.content:
Before you follow, please read this

Don't follow if...

×

  • Basic criteria (ableist, racist, homophobic, proship, says slurs, ...)
  • Just rude

Before you follow

×

  • Please use tone tags w/ me
  • I yap a lot about my interests
  • I may or may not spend time away from people depending on the context
  • I don't really have the habit to text first
  • I do ship some characters together (Itoshi Rin x Bachira Meguru, Nagi Seishiro x Mikage Reo, etc...)
